post.body: ah not the moon in the sky?do you have your own? I have my own stars, but I keep them outside in the sky-they are too big for inside
ahh u're gettin old! jowls n all-that proves it's not photoshopped tho,where'd a faker find such a bad pic of u to paste in?!kidding!
hope the moon looks as beautiful there as it does here :)
isnt the Leonid Meteor shower hitting around about ur launch date?Wont that mess up ur window, or is it too small to affect u?
"wives"?? You have more than one? 0_o Lucky beggar...
I compromised..I ate a teeny tiny bit,just to get that delicious taste in my mouth +fortify me for further chocolate abstinence
wow following more than 16k tweeple?! how do you keep up? I struggle with less than 100!
oh my gosh that is so exciting!!! (and thoroughly deserves its multiple exclaimation marks) Hope it goes smoothly for you.
you'll beat @wossy in less than a week. *whispers* He's not as funny as you. Ooop! Did I say that out loud?? Run away! Run away!
If they did 2 morrisdancing what they did 2 irishdancing w/Riverdance + made it all cool + rhythmic like Stomp! Id be up 4 it
I see I'm not the only one that appreciates your problem-solving talents! @levarburton is singing your praises :)
the question is... Are YOU going to launch this year?
LOL@Pavlov's Cat Day1:rang bell-cat sods off 2:rang bell-cat says he's eaten earlier 3:rang bell-cat answers door 4:cat rang bell-I ate food
Aw man.. I <3 @NASA_SDO_HMI He's so,sweet! :D makes me LOL. follow him *sends subliminal messages into ur tweet stream* follow him follow...
RT:MacWorld:blah blah pictures blah gps blah blah themes blah themes blah collaborate blah blah batteries blah DRM-FREE ITUNES!! blah iPhone
Im a noble soul! Ive successfully resisted choc cravings(teeny pieces dont count.No really-ask ur diet planner!) 'course Mulled wine helped!
Oh why WHY did so many well-intentioned ppl give me chocolate for Xmas?? it's so much easier not to eat it when THERE ISN'T ANY IN THE HOUSE
This would be so much easier if the chocolate was not LOOKING AT ME!!! Shortness of breath, palpitations... I think I'm going to lie down.
I am not going to eat chocolate. I am NOT going to eat chocolate. I am not going to EAT chocolate. I am not going to eat CHOCOLATE. *twitch*
Getting excited about the Cosmic Diary and the International Year of Astronomy http://www.astronomy2009.org
